name: Offbeat Saigon
description:
Today we cycle around areas of the city rarely seen by other visitors,
you will get to see local life along the river banks unchanged for many years.
Experience the hustle and bustle of vibrant local markets, try and buy some of
the exotic local fruits directly from the boat. Observe daily life as you cycle
along over bridges and down streets, a local ferry crossing being one of the
highlights. Absorb the sights and sounds of historic Chinatown before heading
back through the city.
